<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Form Control](/Feats.aspx?ID=4723) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Untamed Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=4713)

</column>

---

With additional care and effort, you can take on an alternate shape for a longer period of time. If your next action is to cast untamed form, the spell’s rank is 2 lower than normal (minimum 1st rank), but you can remain transformed for up to 1 hour or the listed duration (whichever is longer). You can still Dismiss untamed form as normal.

<title level="2">Form Control leads to...</title>
[Perfect Form Control](/Feats.aspx?ID=4763)
name: Form Control
